title: Aleksandr Balakhnin
text:
Aleksandr Nikolayevich Balakhnin (; born April 1, 1955) is a Russian professional <a href="Association%20football">football</a> coach and a former player. He works as a goalkeeping coach with the reserves team of <a href="FC%20Rostov">FC Rostov</a>. He made his professional debut in the <a href="Soviet%20Second%20League">Soviet Second League</a> in 1976 for <a href="FC%20Torpedo%20Taganrog">FC Torpedo Taganrog</a>.
His younger brother <a href="Sergei%20Balakhnin">Sergei Balakhnin</a> also played football professionally.
